00047 class DZ_EXPORT DzDrawStyle : public DzBase, public DzRefCountedItem {
00048     Q_OBJECT
00049     Q_PROPERTY( bool drawObjectsOnly READ drawObjectsOnly WRITE setDrawObjectsOnly )
00050     Q_PROPERTY( bool drawShadowCastersOnly READ drawShadowCastersOnly WRITE setDrawShadowCastersOnly )
00051     Q_PROPERTY( bool renderQuality READ renderQuality WRITE setRenderQuality )
00052     Q_PROPERTY( bool drawCuesDefault READ getDrawCuesDefault WRITE setDrawCuesDefault )
00053     Q_PROPERTY( bool isUserStyle READ isUserStyle )
00054     Q_ENUMS( ShadeStyle TransparencyMode PickingMode )
00055 public:
00056 
00057     enum ShadeStyle { WireBox, SolidBox, Wireframe, LitWireframe, HiddenLine, WireShaded, SmoothShaded,
00058         WireTextured, Textured, GLSLShader, Unshaded, Picking,
00059         WIRE_BOX = WireBox, SOLID_BOX = SolidBox, WIREFRAME = Wireframe, LIT_WIREFRAME = LitWireframe,
00060         HIDDEN_LINE = HiddenLine, WIRE_SHADED = WireShaded, SMOOTH_SHADED = SmoothShaded, 
00061         WIRE_TEXTURED = WireTextured, TEXTURED = Textured, GLSL_SHADER = GLSLShader, UNSHADED = Unshaded,
00062         PICKING = Picking };
00063     enum TransparencyMode { DrawOpaqueOnly, DrawTransparentOnly, DrawBoth,
00064         DRAW_OPAQUE_ONLY = DrawOpaqueOnly, DRAW_TRANSPARENT_ONLY = DrawTransparentOnly, 
00065         DRAW_BOTH = DrawBoth };
00066     enum PickingMode { PickNone, PickFaces, PickPoints, PickNodes, PickMaterials,
00067         PICK_NONE = PickNone, PICK_FACES = PickFaces, PICK_POINTS = PickPoints, PICK_NODES = PickNodes,
00068         PICK_MATERIALS = PickMaterials };
00069 
00070     virtual ~DzDrawStyle();
00071 
00072     //
00073     // MANIPULATORS
00074     //
00075 
00076     void    setTransMode( TransparencyMode mode );
00077     void    setPass( int pass );
00078     void    setDrawObjectsOnly( bool onOff );
00079     void    setDrawShadowCastersOnly( bool onOff );
00080     void    setRenderQuality( bool onOff );
00081     void    setNonOpaqueSorter( DzPolySorter *sorter );
00082     void    setDrawCuesDefault( bool onOff );
00083 
00084     //
00085     // ACCESSORS
00086     //
00087 
00088     PickingMode         pickMode() const;
00089     TransparencyMode    transMode() const;
00090     DzPolySorter*       nonOpaqueSorter() const;
00091     bool                drawObjectsOnly() const;
00092     bool                drawShadowCastersOnly() const;
00093     
00094     bool    renderQuality() const;
00095     bool    getDrawCuesDefault() const;
00096 
00097 public slots:
00098     bool    selectionMapsEnabled() const;
00099     int     pass() const;
00100     bool    drawCues() const;
00101 
00102     void    forceUseLighting();
00103 
00104     ShadeStyle              shadeStyle() const;
00105     virtual DzSceneShader*  shader() const { return NULL; }
00106 
00107 public:
00108 
00109     virtual bool    isUserStyle() const { return false; }
00110 
00111 protected:
00112 
00113     DzDrawStyle( ShadeStyle style );
00114 
00115     void    setPickMode( PickingMode mode );
00116     void    enableSelectionMaps( bool onOff );
00117 
00118 private:
00119     //
00120     // DATA MEMBERS
00121     //
00122 
00123     struct  Data;
00124     Data    *m_data;
00125 };
